23.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
23.text: Oh! Bravo! Bravo! You are growing up to be a fine fellow of the most degraded calibre.

21.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
21.text: The cleric and Last Light, all are now but an ichored slagheap.

103.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
103.text: And it was all your own work! You didn't even need your Butler's advice: you have acted with the utmost decorum. First the bard, now this triumph!

17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
17.text: Don't worry, Master, I will ensure you have a diverse roster of victims from now on. Hapless menfolk deserve death just as much as the girlies.

65.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
65.text: It would damage your reputation if the fearing public thought you a predator. After all, you're far worse than one of those base lusty spree-killers.

11.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
11.text: I was worried when you didn't kill the silly bard I sent for you to play with, but forgive my lack of faith - I only had your best interests at heart.

22.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
22.text: Oh, I rather got carried away there, wherever are my manners? Sceleritas Fel, your undyingly loyal servant, your Butler, before our separation.

114.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
114.text: What in the Hells do you mean, you're my Butler?

19.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
19.text: Oh, my itching Liege, it hurts to hear you recall me not! I had indeed heard rumours you had become indisposed.

35.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
35.text: You know who I was, before I lost my memories?

71.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
71.text: Oh don't say it like that, you're clearly the same-old knife-happy lunatic I have loved ever-long!

1.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
1.text: Your little indisposition has not been able to get rid of what's on the inside. The evil in your rotten heart.

13.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
13.text: The whole time I was killing... you were watching?

121.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
121.text: I fear you are over-working yourself, for I was earnestly trying to find a moment to help set you on the right path, but you were just frolicking away with your dagger, weren't you?

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *Your kill of your poor friend can only mean one thing. The degraded Sceleritas will be back soon enough.*
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge doesn't go to sleep when the companions do, but waits up at the side of the camp. The BUTLER appears behind them.

78.speaker: Narrator
78.text: *Your mind is heavy. The devastation of Last Light is sure to pique the interest of the vile Sceleritas.*
78.context: InternalNodeContext: This should be if you killed NS and accidentally caused the village of Haven to be destroyed.

87.speaker: Narrator
87.text: *Your kill of that poor cleric can mean only one thing: the vile Sceleritas will be here soon enough.*
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge doesn't go to sleep when the companions do, but waits up at the side of the camp. The BUTLER appears behind them.

97.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
97.text: Pray that he was defeated in the attack.

6.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
6.text: Alive again! Sceleritas always comes back. He could never leave his odious liege!

102.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
102.text: Tap your foot impatiently, a butler should be on time!

120.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
120.text: Apologies for the tardiness, my festering liege.

18.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
18.text: I was away admiring her body. I have never seen a torn tibia quite like that!

85.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
85.text: A part of your past is here for you. I come with your disgusting Prize.

98.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
98.text: Quickly, give it to me. I don't want anyone seeing.

79.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
79.text: Oh, soon enough everyone in the Sword Coast and beyond will know about you.

43.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
43.text: But you yearn for the sordid scandal deep down, don't you?

113.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: *The Butler casts an effect to impart the SLAYER FORM upon the DARK URGE*

70.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
70.text: Try on your new jimjams! They're a present from Father, it would be rude not to.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: The DARK URGE turns into the SLAYER

64.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
64.text: Ooh! Such a strapping young behemoth!

100.speaker: Narrator
100.text: *You cannot speak, but you have command over your own cruelty.*

73.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Roaring emerges from the Slayer

63.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
63.text: Do not be afraid, my tainted angel.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Roaring emerges from the Slayer

30.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
30.text: Sceleritas will ensure you stay in harm's way.

84.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
84.text: Force yourself back into your natural form.

46.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
46.text: Focus on your breathing. Release this murderous shape.

40.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
40.text: Try to suppress the beast's rage.

91.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Slayer swipes at the butler. Butler is getting really into it, perhaps shaking his hips and squirming with glee.

26.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
26.text: Don't be cruel! Don't leave incy wincy Sceleritas on edge like that!

5.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
5.text: It's been so long since you last killed me.

56.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
56.text: Please. Please. I know you have the iniquity within you.

36.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Slayer swipes and kills the Butler, Sceleritas goes flying into the air, ragdolling at immense speed.NodeContext: A slightly orgasmic death groan.

82.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Another Sceleritas is swiftly created in front of you, with a glow, he appears again.

54.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
54.text: Thank you. Your claws hit like a kiss.

47.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
47.text: Every death brings a new, brighter, better Sceleritas into this world.

48.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
48.text: You would be lost without your Butler, but you shall never be without me.

119.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
119.text: Take command and return to yourself.

4.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
4.text: And look at you! Now you're your perfect self again.

101.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
101.text: This form is the Slayer. You will do many naughty feats with it.

83.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
83.text: I wish I had been blessed with a few more moments of ogling, but the Slayer will be back soon.

117.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
117.text: Glorious! I shall do my best to honour its brutality.

25.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
25.text: It sparkles resplendently! I shall be back after your next triumph.

110.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
110.text: You are going to kill again soon. You will keep chopping down the Moonmaiden's family tree.

67.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
67.text: I shall return when you next have need of me.

96.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
96.text: I have your estate to attend to, we will meet again there. Good night, sweet Master.

38.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
38.text: I tire of killing, please, let me be free.

31.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
31.text: There are endless combinations of moral atrocities ready to be penned.

41.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
41.text: If you ever feel you're losing your spark, I would recommend breaking a few taboos.

94.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
94.text: A bit of infanticide here and a touch of cannibalism there are sure to inspire you again.

111.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
111.text: You're going to tell me everything about my lineage, or else!

45.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
45.text: There is nothing you can do to me I would not enjoy.

58.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
58.text: And there is nothing you can do to thwart yourself. You are perfection.

61.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
61.text: But you should be hopeful for your bright future!

76.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
76.text: I wish I had time to wax your hide and brush your spines, but your adoring Butler must away.
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: PLAYER TURNS BACK INTO HUMANOID FORM ON THIS NODE

112.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Slayer swipes and kills the Butler, Sceleritas goes flying into the air, ragdolling at immense speed.NodeContext: A slightly orgasmic death groan.

7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
7.text: I hope you will consider killing me in future, Master.

92.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
92.text: I'll take your sugary trinket, but my killing comes from pure desire.

93.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
93.text: This Prize is no payment, but a sign of reverence towards you.

0.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
0.text: I don't want it, it clearly wasn't enough to save me before.

57.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
57.text: You didn't have it before, but wished for it. I was pained to watch you pine and pine!

42.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
42.text: If it's from my old life, I don't want anything to do with it.

69.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
69.text: Your past and future are avowed life-long lovers.

105.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
105.text: Fantasise about the dark prize you will soon receive.

74.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
74.text: Mmmm, I have something wonderful for you, dear mouldering Master.

86.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
86.text: Fret in fear - will you ever be free of him?

34.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
34.text: Excellent work with the Cleric, but we are only now getting started.

60.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
60.text: Excellent betrayal the other night! I could not have backstabbed better myself!

29.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
29.text: My crumbs of doubt in you were most unjust. You killed your darling! Encore!

49.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
49.text: Mourn your deeds. You regret them all.

77.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
77.text: No! Don't be sad, Master! I am here to give you a happy present!

3.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
3.text: Yawn. You're missing your sleep waiting up for him.

122.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
122.text: Oh! Milord is tired! I will tuck them in personally, with a bedtime story of their former self.
